actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator McCain with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 105-67.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 149.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel DUSKEN IV.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel DUSKEN IV.
